BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.sqlserver.dcl.SQLServerAlterUserStatement.getUser() may expose internal representation by returning SQLServerAlterUserStatement.user

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.sqlserver.dcl.SQLServerAlterUserStatement.setUser(UserSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into SQLServerAlterUserStatement.user
